name: Bermuda Triangle Pendant Necklace
description:
Bermuda Triangle Pendant Necklace by MKTPRICE. Solid casted skull paired with a bone structured triangle pendant. Both made of solid brass, and hung on a vintage brass link chain.

Made in the USA, by the USA

name: Vintage Casted Army Man Necklace
description:
Vintage Casted Army Man Necklace by MKTPRICE. We used original 1960s army men and created moulds die cast figurines that can be used as paper weights, desk ornaments or chain ornaments as shown.

Made from solid brass

Made in the USA, by the USA

10% of proceeds go to supporting US troops overseas

description:

Made of solid, hand-polished brass for a bendable, easy fit. 
An approximate 60mm circumference/opening and 4mm gauge thickness.

Unisex. 

By MKTPRICE

name: LOCK-RINGS [STACKABLE]
description:
UNION Parts & Recreation.

Show your enthusiasm for the sport and aesthetic behind the art of bicycle building & design.

Stackable Lock-Rings. Stack 'em or wear them single- mix & match colors or match 'em proper- Either way, you'll love wearing these rings!!

$12 each or a set of 3 for $30! 

Unisex style designed for men and women alike. 
Comes with small velvet pouch for storage & protection. 
Designed & Made in the USA.


14k/18k gold & sterling silver available upon request.

options.name: 3 color Combo- specify colors upon checkout

name: COG Bracelet
description:
UNION Parts & Recreation Bicycle Jewelry

Show your enthusiasm for the sport and aesthetic behind the art of bicycle building & design.

These high-polished Cog bangles are almost exact replicas of the real thing. Come in high polished Silver, Gold & Gunmetal finishes. Can be worn single or stacked together with mixed colors.

Hard, Sassy & still feminine.

Comes with small velvet pouch for storage & protection. Designed & Made in the USA.

name: BICYCLE SEAT CHARM NECKLACE
description:
UNION Parts & Recreation.

Show your enthusiasm for the sport and aesthetic behind the art of bicycle building & design.

This little guy is an exact replica of a saddle {aka} bicycle seat you would find on any classic road, track or fixed gear bike! It stands at a little under 1/2 inch tall and 1/4 inch across. Comes on your choice color of 30 inch ball chain.

Unisex style designed for men and women alike. 
Comes with small velvet pouch for storage & protection. 
Designed & Made in the USA.

14k/18k gold & sterling silver available upon request.

name: BICYCLE FORK CHARM NECKLACE
description:
UNION Parts & Recreation.

Show your enthusiasm for the sport and aesthetic behind the art of bicycle building & design.

This little guy is an exact replica of a bicycle fork that you would find on any classic road, track or fixed gear bike! It stands at a little over an inch and a half tall and a quarter inch across. Comes in several finishes such as shiny gold, gunmetal, oxidized silver and oxidized brass. Comes on your choice color OF 30 inch ball chain.

Unisex style designed for men and women alike. 
Comes with small velvet pouch for storage & protection. 
Designed & Made in the USA.

14k/18k gold & sterling silver available upon request.

Comes with small velvet pouch for storage & protection.

description:

Hard, Hyphy, Stylish & Fun - that's all I have to say.
